name: Powerstar
overview: A vertically scrolling shooter where you are the lone pilot of a spaceship, your mission is to reach the heart of the enemy attack system at the end of a narrow tunnel. This corridor is extremely dangerous as it is protected from meteorites and space vehicles of various kinds. As you maneuver to avoid obstacles, fire lasers to destroy or at least keep enemy forces away, keep the energy level constant by traversing the energy stars, and rejoin your mothership to continue the daring mission. Published in Italy as Corridoio Nemico in the Super Game 2000 n.6 (luglio/agosto 1985) compilation.
